parameters.query: select id as gym_id from gyms where status = 'active';

=-- Aggregation query for gym {{$json["gym_id"]}}
-- We calculate metrics for 'yesterday' relative to run time (assuming run at 00:00)
select
  '{{$json["gym_id"]}}'::uuid as gym_id,
  current_date - interval '1 day' as metric_date,
  (select count(*) from members where gym_id = '{{$json["gym_id"]}}' and last_churn_score >= 70.0) as high_risk_count,
  (select count(*) from members where gym_id = '{{$json["gym_id"]}}' and last_contacted_at >= now() - interval '24 hours') as contacted_last_1d_count,
  (select count(*) from contacted_log where gym_id = '{{$json["gym_id"]}}' and channel = 'sms' and created_at >= current_date - interval '1 day' and created_at < current_date) as sms_sent_count,
  (select count(*) from contacted_log where gym_id = '{{$json["gym_id"]}}' and channel = 'email' and created_at >= current_date - interval '1 day' and created_at < current_date) as email_sent_count,
  (select count(*) from engagement_events where gym_id = '{{$json["gym_id"]}}' and channel = 'sms' and event_type = 'click' and created_at >= current_date - interval '1 day' and created_at < current_date) as sms_click_count,
  (select count(*) from engagement_events where gym_id = '{{$json["gym_id"]}}' and channel = 'email' and event_type = 'open' and created_at >= current_date - interval '1 day' and created_at < current_date) as email_open_count,
  (select count(*) from engagement_events where gym_id = '{{$json["gym_id"]}}' and channel = 'email' and event_type = 'click' and created_at >= current_date - interval '1 day' and created_at < current_date) as email_click_count;
